00014 #ifndef XMLSERVERERRORMSG_H
00015 #define XMLSERVERERRORMSG_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 
00019 #include "MC2String.h"
00020 #include <stdexcept>
00021 
00022 class StringCode;
00023 
00024 class XMLServerErrorMsg: public std::exception {
00025 public:
00027    template<class STRING1, class STRING2>
00028    XMLServerErrorMsg( const STRING1& code,
00029                       const STRING2& msg ) throw() 
00030          : m_code( code ),
00031            m_msg( msg ),
00032            m_uri( "" ) {}
00033    template<class STRING1, class STRING2, class STRING3>
00034    XMLServerErrorMsg( const STRING1& code,
00035                       const STRING2& msg,
00036                       const STRING3& uri ) throw() 
00037          : m_code( code ),
00038            m_msg( msg ),
00039            m_uri( uri ) {}
00043    XMLServerErrorMsg( StringCode error ) throw();
00044    ~XMLServerErrorMsg() throw() { }
00045    const MC2String& getCode() const {
00046       return m_code;
00047    }
00048    const MC2String& getMsg() const {
00049       return m_msg;
00050    }
00051    const MC2String& getURI() const {
00052       return m_uri;
00053    }
00054    const char* what() const throw() {
00055       return m_msg.c_str();
00056    }
00057 private:
00058    MC2String m_code;
00059    MC2String m_msg;
00060    MC2String m_uri;
00061 };
